member.name: T:RRCAG.Data.DataRetriever
member.summary: Provides methods for retrieving vehicle data.

member.name: M:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Vehicle class.
member.param: The stock ID of the Vehicle.
The year the Vehicle was manufactured.
The company that manufactured the Vehicle.
The mileage of the Vehicle in kilometers.
Whether the Vehicle has an automatic transmission.
The base price of the Vehicle.
member.exception: When the stock ID is blank.
When the year is less than 1885.
When the year is greater than 9999.
When the mileage is less than zero.
When the base price is less than zero.

member.name: M:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.ToString
member.summary: Returns a String representation of the Vehicle.
member.returns: A String representation of the Vehicle.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.StockID
member.summary: Gets and sets the Vehicle's Stock ID.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.ManufacturedYear
member.summary: Gets and sets the year the Vehicle was manufactured.
member.exception: When the value is less than 1885.
When the value is greater than 9999.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.Manufacturer
member.summary: Gets and sets the company that manufactured the Vehicle.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.Model
member.summary: Gets and sets the model of the Vehicle.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.Mileage
member.summary: Gets and sets the Vehicle's mileage in kilometers.
member.exception: When the value is less than zero.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.IsAutomatic
member.summary: Gets and sets whether the Vehicle has an automatic transmission.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.Colour
member.summary: Gets and sets the colour of the Vehicle.

member.name: P:RRCAG.Data.Vehicle.BasePrice
member.summary: Gets and sets the base price of the vehicle.
member.exception: When the value is less than zero.
